# HyperBox Daily Social Media Strategy

## Daily Tweet/Post Template (Twitter/X, Mastodon, LinkedIn)

Post one of these every weekday, 10:00 AM UTC:

### Template 1: Bug Fix Released
```
üêõ FIXED: [Bug description]

Our beta testers found this issue, we fixed it, and it's live now in the latest release.

That's the power of community-driven development.

Thanks to @[beta_tester] for the report!

#HyperBox #OpenSource #Docker
```

### Template 2: Feature Highlight
```
‚ú® DID YOU KNOW? HyperBox supports [feature name]

[1-2 sentence benefit description]

Try it: hb [command example]

#HyperBox #Containers #DevTools
```

### Template 3: Performance Metric
```
‚ö° SPEED: HyperBox starts containers in ~100ms

That's 20-140x faster than traditional Docker Desktop.

```

## Weekly Content Plan

**Monday:** Bug Fix Released
**Tuesday:** Feature Highlight
**Wednesday:** Tutorial / How-To
**Thursday:** Performance Metric
**Friday:** Community Testimonial or Roadmap Update

## Hashtag Strategy

### Primary Tags
#HyperBox #Docker #Containers

### Secondary Tags
#Rust #OpenSource #DevTools #CI-CD

### Trending Tags (if relevant)
#docker #containers #kubernetes #linux #cloudnative

## Platform-Specific Tips

### Twitter/X
- Tag relevant accounts: @rustlang @docker @cncf @linux
- Use thread format for longer content
- Include images/gifs when possible
- Reply to comments within 4 hours

### LinkedIn
- More formal tone
- Focus on productivity/efficiency benefits
- Tag relevant influencers and companies
- Encourage sharing in comments

### Mastodon
- Use #HyperBox hashtag
- Longer-form posts acceptable
- Link to detailed blog posts
- Active in #rust and #containers communities

## Response Protocol

- Monitor all comments and mentions
- Respond to questions within 24 hours
- Thank contributors publicly
- Direct complex issues to GitHub Issues
- Celebrate wins and milestones with community
